Sentencas: The major concerns with the ferritic stainless steel interconnects of solid oxide fuel cells operated at intermediate temperatures are the growth of non-protective oxide scales and the Cr evaporation into the cathode, which can increase significantly the cell resistance and polarization resistance.
Titulo: Preparation and high temperature performances of DyCrO3-based coatings on a ferritic stainless steel interconnect material

Sentencas: An additional coating is needed to solve these problems.
Titulo: Preparation and high temperature performances of DyCrO3-based coatings on a ferritic stainless steel interconnect material

Sentencas: Perovskite DyCrO3-based coatings for a type 430 stainless steel (430SS) interconnect are prepared by a high-energy micro-arc alloying (HEMAA) process using a rod of DyCrO3-20 wt.%Ni as the deposition electrode.
Titulo: Preparation and high temperature performances of DyCrO3-based coatings on a ferritic stainless steel interconnect material

Sentencas: Area specific resistance and oxidation behavior of the uncovered and covered steel at 850 degrees C in both air and wet air are examined.
Titulo: Preparation and high temperature performances of DyCrO3-based coatings on a ferritic stainless steel interconnect material

Sentencas: The as-deposited DyCrO3-based coatings are mainly composed of DyCrO3 with some Ni and (Ni,Fe)Cr2O4, with a metallurgical bonding to the substrate.
Titulo: Preparation and high temperature performances of DyCrO3-based coatings on a ferritic stainless steel interconnect material

Sentencas: The coated steel in both air and wet air has a relatively fast mass gain in the initial stage, followed by a very low mass gain, forming a three-layered scale with a NiFe2O4 outer layer, a thick DyCrO3 sublayer and a thin Cr2O3-rich inner layer.
Titulo: Preparation and high temperature performances of DyCrO3-based coatings on a ferritic stainless steel interconnect material

Sentencas: The DyCrO3-based coatings can inhibit significantly the oxidation of 430SS, especially the breakaway oxidation in wet air, and have a low area specific electrical resistance.
Titulo: Preparation and high temperature performances of DyCrO3-based coatings on a ferritic stainless steel interconnect material
Preparation and high temperature performances of DyCrO3-based coatings on a ferritic stainless steel interconnect material
Preparation and high temperature performances of DyCrO3-based coatings on a ferritic stainless steel interconnect material
